custom.Disclaimer: We use cookies, ok? It's 2017; is everyone cool with 'cookies' yet?
custom.Terms: This is a checkbox that indicates you agree to our 2,000 page terms

webchat.ChatFailed: There was a problem starting the chat session. Please Retry.
webchat.AgentUnavailable: Sorry. There are no agents available. Please try later
webchat.ChatInputPlaceholder: Type your message here and hit return
webchat.ChatEndQuestion: Are you sure you want to end this chat session?
webchat.InviteBody: Let us know if we can help out.
webchat.RestoreTimeoutBody: Your previous chat session has timed out. Would you like to start a new one?
webchat.EndConfirmBody: Would you really like to end your chat session?

webchat.IdleMessage1: If left inactive, your session will end soon. - en
webchat.IdleMessage2: If left inactive, your session will end in - en
webchat.IdleMessageClose: Your chat session has ended due to inactivity.

Errors.ChatUnavailable: We're sorry but we cannot start a new chat at this time. Please try again later
Errors.CriticalFault: Your chat session has ended unexpectedly due to an unknown issue. We apologize for the inconvenience

Errors.MessageFailed: Your message was not received successfully. Please try again
Errors.RestoreFailed: We're sorry but we were unable to restore your chat session due to an unknown error

cobrowse.youLeft: You have left the session. Co-browse is now terminated.
cobrowse.sessionTimedOut: Session timed out. Co-browse is now terminated.
cobrowse.sessionInactiveTimedOut: Session timed out. Co-browse is now terminated.
cobrowse.agentLeft: Representative has left the session. Co-browse is now terminated.
cobrowse.sessionError: Unexpected error occured. Co-browse is now terminated.
cobrowse.sessionStarted: Co-browse session started. Waiting for representative to connect to the session…
cobrowse.navRefresh: Representative has refreshed the page. Reloading.
cobrowse.navBack: Representative has pressed the "Back" button. Reloading page.
cobrowse.navForward: Representative has pressed the "Forward" button. Reloading page.
cobrowse.navUrl: Representative has requested navigation. Reloading page.
cobrowse.navFailed: Navigation request by representative has failed.
cobrowse.contentMaskedPartially: Some content is hidden from representative
cobrowse.areYouOnPhone: Are you on the phone with our representative?
cobrowse.areYouOnPhoneOrChat: Are you on the phone or chat with our representative?
cobrowse.connectBeforeCobrowse: You need to be connected with our representative to continue with co-browsing. Please call us or start a live chat with us, and then start Co-browse again.
cobrowse.sessionStartedAutoConnect: Co-browse session started. Waiting for representative to connect to the session…

Unfortunately, your browser is not currently supported.

Supported browsers are:

  • Safari 6 and above

knowledgecenter.ArticleHelpfulnessYesDesc: Great! We're very pleased to hear that the article assisted you in your search. Have a great day!
knowledgecenter.ArticleHelpfulnessNoDesc: We're sorry that the article wasn't a good match for your search. We thank you for your feedback!
knowledgecenter.Title: Ask a Question
knowledgecenter.NoResultsTextUnder: We're sorry but we could not find a suitable answer for you.
knowledgecenter.NoResultsTextRephrase: Could you please try rephrasing the question?

knowledgecenter.WelcomeMessage: Hello and Welcome! A Live agent will be with you shortly. In the meantime, can I assist you with any questions you may have? Please type a question into the input field below.

knowledgecenter.UnansweredMessage: Results for query "<%UnansweredQuery%>" have been marked as unanswered.

knowledgecenter.ArticleHelpfulnessYesDesc: Большой! Мы очень рады услышать, что эта статья помогала вам в вашем поиске. Хорошего дня!
knowledgecenter.ArticleHelpfulnessNoDesc: Мы сожалеем, что эта статья не был хороший матч для поиска. Мы благодарим Вас за Ваш отзыв!
knowledgecenter.Title: Задайте вопрос
knowledgecenter.NoResultsTextUnder: Мы сожалеем, но мы не смогли найти подходящий ответ для вас.
knowledgecenter.NoResultsTextRephrase: Не могли бы вы попробовать перефразировать вопрос?
knowledgecenter.GKCIsUnavailable: Центр знаний сервера в настоящее время не доступен
knowledgecenter.WelcomeMessage: Привет и добро пожаловать! Живым агентом будет с вами в ближайшее время. В то же время, я могу помочь Вам с любыми вопросами вы можете иметь? Пожалуйста, введите вопрос в поле ввода ниже.
knowledgecenter.SearchResult: While waiting for an Agent to connect, here are the most relevant answers to your query:
knowledgecenter.NoDocumentsFound: Прости. Статьи не соответствует ваш вопрос. Вы хотели бы задать еще один вопрос?
knowledgecenter.AnsweredMessage: Результаты поиска по запросу запроса "<%AnsweredQuery%>" были отмечены как имеющие отношение.
knowledgecenter.UnansweredMessage: Результаты поиска по запросу запроса "<%UnansweredQuery%>" были отмечены как имеющие отношение
